metadata.name: 3â€™s Company - BRUSHFIRE
metadata.description: BIG3 Ownership is an innovative, new approach to team ownership in professional sports. The league is creating a new model of ownership by leveraging blockchain technology to sell NFTs that represent ownership-like value in its twelve teams. All editions include voting rights towards team actions, priceless gameday experiences and VIP tickets to all games, and limited-edition team, league, and championship merchandise and memorabilia. Fire editions also include exclusive intellectual property and licensing rights to team names, logos, and merchandise as well as additional gameday activations.
